sentences.en: At its crudest, talk of " reciprocity " can sound grim.
sentences.cn: 从最坏的角度来看, “ 互惠互利 ” 一说似乎有些无情无义.

sentences.en: Beauvoir's utopian ideal is the reciprocity and comradeship between men and women.
sentences.cn: 波伏娃的乌托邦理想是男女之间的相互作用和情谊关系.

sentences.en: Besides the translating skills, principle of reciprocity also needs carefully study.
sentences.cn: 它既要讲究翻译中的对等原则,还要具备一定的翻译技巧.

sentences.en: Company has always uphold integrity. Reciprocity principle business philosophy!
sentences.cn: 公司一向秉承诚信. 互惠之原则的经营理念!

sentences.en: Form the beginning, both A and B assume this reciprocity of typification.
sentences.cn: 一开始, A和B都假定了这种交互作用类型.

sentences.en: Furthermore, the reciprocity of peg and soil is equaled to pole - spring model.
sentences.cn: 按比拟杆 — 附加弹簧模型简化等效桩土相互作用.

sentences.en: It is a mutual relationship, a true reciprocity we are now engaged in building.
sentences.cn: 我们正在建立的是一种相互的, 真正互惠的关系.

sentences.en: Naturally, there should be mutual concession and there should be reciprocity.
sentences.cn: 自然, 双方都要作些让步,并且要礼尚往来.

sentences.en: Reciprocity includes more than gifts and favors; it also applies to concessions that people make to one another.
sentences.cn: 互惠不仅仅包括礼物和优待; 它对人们之间互相作出的让步也同样适用.

sentences.en: Reciprocity of the three aspacts decide optimal decision of the investors.
sentences.cn: 这三者之间的相互作用决定了投资者的最优决策.

sentences.en: The degree of reciprocity in negotiations should take into account the varying stages of economic development.
sentences.cn: 谈判中对等的程度应考虑到经济发展的不同阶段.

sentences.en: The stellar astronomers have to accept low intensity reciprocity failure as a significant fact of life.
sentences.cn: 恒星天文学家不得不承认低强度倒易律失效是重大的事实.

sentences.en: There are a number of alternative formulations of the reciprocity theorem.
sentences.cn: 还有许多别的互易定理的公式.

sentences.en: They gave assurances they would press for reciprocity with Greece in the issuing of visas.
sentences.cn: 他们保证将推进本国与希腊两国间签证的互相发放。

sentences.en: They said they would press for reciprocity with Greece in the issuing of visas.
sentences.cn: 他们说，他们将会对希腊施压，以达成签证发放的互惠。

sentences.en: We could at least have attempted to exact some reciprocity in the negotiation.
sentences.cn: 我们本来可以在谈判中至少换取点互惠.

words.tran_cn: 相互作用（复数reciprocities）；[数]相互性；互惠主义

trans.tran_cn: 相互性，相互作用，互给，互惠
trans.tran_en: a situation in which two people, groups, or countries give each other similar kinds of help or special rights
